Html: I'm currently running Ubuntu 12.04 and would really like a build for Linux. (Either stand-alone or .deb). This or at least clear directions on how to compile manually.

Hello,

Your best bet for getting a version running on linux is to check out from here. The only requirement to build should be that you will need the wxWidgets dev lib (at least version 2.8). Let me know if you have any issues building. If I have time I might try and create a package for you.

BuckeyeDude
Would you please? I can't get it right.

I would also like to see Linux builds directly downloadable.

Issue asking for Linux builds: https://wabbit.codeplex.com/workitem/12275
